rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with ample storage and Vastu-aligned placement to promote positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room connected to a minimalistic kitchen, adhering to modern minimalist design principles. Large windows provide natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with functional layout and Vastu-compliant placement of cooking zone for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility room adjacent to kitchen for efficient workflow, designed in minimalist style.

openings.name: Window
openings.location: south wall of living room and kitchen

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and Vastu-aligned layout for health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom optimized for privacy, minimal design with built-in storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed in minimalist style to maintain simplicity and functionality.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom shared between Bedrooms 2 and 3, with functional fixtures and Vastu-compliant water placement.

openings.name: Bedroom Windows
openings.location: various sides to ensure cross-ventilation per Vastu principles

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Luxury home theater designed with acoustics and lighting for an immersive experience, aligned with minimalist aesthetics.
